sectionText: Promoting Undergraduate Research in Engineering (PURE)) is a research program that aims to provide first-hand research experience to underclassmen in engineering. The PURE program pairs graduate mentors up with undergraduate students on a semester-long research project and expect students to produce and present posters at the year-end symposium. Student must apply and be accepted to PURE before enrolling in the ENG 199 PUR course. For further details, please visit: https://wiki.cites.illinois.edu/wiki/display/PURE/
